title: Kohler 2714-8-NY Bryant 18-7/8" Circular Vitreous China Drop In Bathroom Sink with Overflow and 3 Faucet Holes at 8" Centers
item_description:
Kohler 2714-8-NY Bryant 18-7/8" Circular Vitreous China Drop In Bathroom Sink with Overflow and 3 Faucet Holes at 8" Centers

  • Seller States: Brand New - Opened box to take pictures
  • Overall Length: 18-7/8" (left to right of sink)
  • Overall Width: 18-7/8" (front to back of sink)
  • Overall Height: 7-5/8" (top to bottom of sink)
  • Basin Length: 12-1/2" (left to right of basin)
  • Basin Width: 16-5/16" (front to back of basin)
  • Basin Depth: 7-5/8" (top to bottom of basin)
  • Faucet Centers: 8" (distance between outer
  • faucet holes)
  • Drain Connection Size: 1-3/4"
  • Faucet Hole Size: 1-3/8"
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
